import React, { FunctionComponent, useState } from 'react'; import Skin from '../../models/skin' import './style.css' type Props = { request: Function } const SkinForm: FunctionComponent = ({ request }) => { var objectField: any = { coiffe: '', cape: '', bouclier: '', costume: '', familier: '' } var colorField: any = { peau: '', cheveux: '', habit1: '', habit2: '', habit3: '' } const reset = () => { console.log(objectField) } const classList: string[] = [ 'Zobal', 'Iop', 'Sram', 'Ouginak', 'Eniripsa', 'Steamer', 'Enutrof', 'Cra', 'Roublard', 'Sacrieur', 'Eliotrope', 'Xelor', 'Pandawa', 'Feca', 'Forgelance', 'Osamodas', 'Sadida', 'Ecaflip' ]; const handleInputChangeColor = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { colorField = { ...colorField, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }; console.log(colorField) } const handleInputChangeObject = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { objectField = { ...objectField, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }; console.log(objectField) } return (
